text: khaṇḍitavāgiyū phir‌aunanu bhūmiyalli vidrōha merediddanu mattu bhūvāsigaḷannu paṅgaḍagaḷāgi viṅgaḍisiddanu. Avanu avarallina ondu paṅgaḍavannu durbalagoḷisi avara putrara koraḷu koydu biḍuttiddanu hāgū avara mahiḷeyarannu mātra jīvantaviḍuttiddanu. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū avanu aśānti habbuvavanāgiddanu
